    • addVeterinarian

      public void addVeterinarian​(java.lang.String idNumber, java.lang.String fullName, java.lang.String registerNumber, int attendedPets, java.lang.String attendingNow)
      Method to create a Veterinarian in the first empty space of veterinarians array.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - must be a String composed of numbers
      fullName - must have name and surname included
      registerNumber - must be a String which can combine letters and numbers
      attendedPets - must be 0
      attendingNow - must be null

    • eraseVeterinarian

      public void eraseVeterinarian​(java.lang.String idNumber)
      Method to erase a Veterinarian from the veterinarians array.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - must be a String composed of numbers

    • printAllVeterinarians

      public void printAllVeterinarians()
      Method to show all Veterinarians in the veterinarians array.

    • addPet

      public void addPet​(java.lang.String species, java.lang.String petName, int age, java.lang.String breed, java.lang.String symptoms, model.Priority priority, model.Status status, java.lang.String ownerName, java.lang.String ownerId, java.lang.String ownerPhone, java.lang.String ownerAddress, java.lang.String attendedById)
      Method to create a Pet in the first empty space of pets arrays, and then assign it's owner.
      If the owner doesn't exist, the user must create it.
      Parameters:
      species - must be an animal species
      petName - must be a String, can contain more than one word
      age - must be an integer
      breed - if species is dog or cat, must be a String, else it's null
      symptoms - must be a String, can be as long as the user needs
      priority - must be one of five Priority options
      status - must be "Waiting" when created, the can be changed to one of five Status options
      ownerName - must be a String with name and surname included
      ownerId - must be a String composed of numbers
      ownerPhone - must be a String with a phone number (10 digits)
      ownerAddress - must contain an address (words, numbers, symbols)
      attendedById - must start as null, then will show ID of Veterinarian who attended the Pet

    • repeatedPet

      public boolean repeatedPet​(java.lang.String petName)
      Method to verify if a Pet's name already exists.
      Parameters:
      petName - must be a String, can contain more than one word
      Returns:
      true if name exists, false if it doesn't

    • erasePet

      public void erasePet​(java.lang.String petName)
      Method to erase a Pet from the pets array.
      Parameters:
      petName - must be a String, can contain more than one word

      public void addOwner​(java.lang.String idNumber, java.lang.String fullName, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String address)
      Method to create an Owner in the first empty space of owners array.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - must be a String composed of numbers
      fullName - must be a String with name and surname included
      phone - must be a String with a phone number (10 digits)
      address - must contain an address (words, numbers, symbols)

    • ownerExists

      public boolean ownerExists​(java.lang.String ownerName)
      Method to verify if the Owner given by the user already exists.
      Parameters:
      ownerName - must be a String with name and surname included
      Returns:
      true if the Owner already exists, false if it doesn't

    • newConsultation

      public void newConsultation​(java.lang.String petName, java.lang.String idNumber, model.Status status)
      Method to start a new consultation. Assigns to the Veterinarian the Pet being attended, and to the Pet the Veterinarian that attended it.
      Parameters:
      petName - must be a String, can contain more than one word
      idNumber - must be a String composed of numbers
      status - must be "Consulting" by default

    • finishConsultation

      public void finishConsultation​(java.lang.String petName, java.lang.String idNumber, java.lang.String status)
      Method to end a consultation.
      Assigns to the Veterinarian the Pet being attended as null.
      Parameters:
      petName - must be a String, can contain more than one word
      idNumber - must be a String which can combine letters and numbers
      status - must be one of these three: "Transfer", "Authorized", "Unattended"

    • attentionPending

      public int attentionPending()
      Method to print the number of pets pending for attendance.
      Returns:
      number of pets pending of attendance

    • nextAttendant

      public java.lang.String nextAttendant()
      Method to print the next pet to be attended.
      Must prioritize Priority over arrival order. Still has mistakes.
      Returns:
      name of next Pet to be attended

    • mostAttended

      public java.lang.String mostAttended()
      Method to show the name of the Veterinarian that attended the most pets.
      Returns:
      the name of the Veterinarian that attended the most pets

      public void petsPerPriority()
      Method to show quantity of pets attended per each Priority.

      Method to erase all Pets from pets array.
